titles.title: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes: Summer Special
探偵オペラ ミルキィホームズ サマー・スペシャル

anime.description: * Milky Holmes was originally conceived as a multimedia franchise by TCG developer http://anidb.net/cr6287 [Bushiroad]. After some pushing by Irene and her father and a lack of support otherwise, http://anidb.net/ch21216 [Kokoro] stubbornly quits her job as a police detective to become an idol. She soon finds the idol life draining and starts to miss her old detective life. When http://anidb.net/ch27319 [Henriette] notices http://anidb.net/ch19193 [Sherlock]`s loneliness without her, she stages a statue theft in order to convince Kokoro to return to the force. Note: Initially screened at a special event, which was also streamed on NicoNico Douga. First TV broadcast took place on 25.08.2011 on Tokyo MX.

tag.name: idol
tag.description: In Japanese culture, idols (アイドル) are media personalities in their teens and early twenties who are considered particularly cute and cuddly and who will, for a period ranging from several months to a few years, regularly appear in the mass media, e.g. as singers for J-pop groups, bit-part actors, TV personalities, models in photo spreads published in magazines, advertisements, etc. Source: wiki

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: music
tag.description: Music anime generally revolves around people concerned with music in their everyday lives. In addition they often adhere to certain genre conventions, the emphasis on training and practice in preparation for competitions, characters desire for self improvement, and pursuit of a specific goal. This is not unlike the Sports category.

tag.name: the arts
tag.description: The arts represent an outlet of human expression, usually influenced by culture, and driven by human creative impulse. Major constituents of the arts include literature – including poetry, novels and short stories, and epics; performing arts – among them music, dance, and theatre; culinary arts such as baking, chocolatiering, and winemaking; media arts like photography and film, and visual arts – including drawing, painting, and sculpting. Some art forms combine a visual element with performance (e.g. film) and the written word (e.g. comics). From prehistoric cave paintings to modern day films, art serves as a vessel for storytelling and conveying mankind`s relationship with its environment. Source: Wiki

character.name: Hercule Burton
character.description: Hercules Barton is a very shy girl, named after Hercule Poirot, who is easily embarrassed. Her Toy gives her superhuman strength.

character.name: Cordelia Glauca
character.description: Cordelia is a blonde girl who often gets delusional concerning the relationship within the group, named after Cordelia Gray. She tends to get rather delusional whenever she is scared. Her Toy allows her to see and hear things others cannot.

character.name: Sherlock Shellinford
character.description: Sherlock Sherringford is the leader of Milky Holmes, named after Sherlock Holmes. She`s known to be particularly clumsy but is always caring. Her Toy gives her telekinesis.

character.name: Yuzurizaki Nero
character.description: Yuzurizaki Nero is an obnoxious girl with a hefty appetite, named after Nero Wolfe. She speaks with the masculine term boku. Her Toy allows her to control machines.

character.name: Arsene
character.description: Arsene is the leader of the Gentlemen Thieves whose Toys can cast illusions. She is currently undercover as the Student Council President at Holmes Academy. She craves strong opponents such as Sherlock to fight against, so when Milky Holmes lose their Toys, she strives to help them to return to their most powerful states so they can satisfy her. Named after Arsène Lupin, her toys is the toys of Resplendence.

character.name: Stone River
character.description: Stone River is a stern man who battles with a katana. His Toys allow him to immobilize an opponent. Undercover as a school janitor. Named after Ishikawa Goemon.

character.name: Twenty
character.description: Twenty is a crafty magician who uses various English words and attacks using cards. He is wildly perverted and constantly shows off his erect nipples to the chagrin of the students. His toys allows him to disguise perfectly. Undercover as a teacher. His name is based after Edogawa Rampo`s The Fiend of Twenty Faces.

character.name: Rat
character.description: Rat is a young boy with a Flame Toy used for lighting various explosives. Undercover as a classmate. Named after Nezumi Kozou.

character.name: Akechi Kokoro
character.description: Akechi Kokoro is the leader of Genius 4 (known as G4 for short), a police investigation unit. She is a bossy girl who looks down on Milky Holmes since they lost their toys. She smacks Sherlock with a golden mask whenever she calls her Kokoro-chan. Her name is based on Edogawa Rampo`s Kogoro Akechi.

character.name: Tooyama Saku
character.description: Touyama Saku is a soft spoken girl who wears headphones. She appears to have a thing for retro technology. Her name is based on Touyama Kagemoto.

character.name: Zenigata Tsugiko
character.description: Zenigata Tsugiko is a spunky green haired girl. Her name is based on Zenigata Heiji.

character.name: Hasegawa Hirano
character.description: Hasegawa Hirano is a polite girl who can deal a sleep-inducing karate chop. Her name is based on Hasegawa Heizou.

character.name: Henriette Mystere
character.description: Henriette is the student council president. Her real identity is that of the phantom thief Arsene.

character.name: Nijuuri Kai
character.description: Nijuuri Kai is a teacher. His real identity is that of phantom thief Twenty.

character.name: Ishinagare Souseki
character.description: Ishinagare Souseki is a school janitor. His real identity is that of phantom thief Stone River.

character.name: Nezu Jirou
character.description: Nezu Jirou is a classmate of Milky Holmes. His real identity is that of phantom thief Rat.

character.name: Milky Holmes
character.description: Milky Holmes is a group of four aspiring young girl detectives who attend the Holmes Detective Academy, and each girl possesses their own unique Toy.

character.name: Kaitou Teikoku
character.description: Kaitou Teikoku is a group of phantom thieves led by Arsene.

character.name: Genius 4
character.description: Genius 4, known as G4 for short, is a police investigation unit.
